mapper.insert: insert into member (pid, pw, pname, tel, birth, reg_date, addr1, addr2, email, grade, dog1, dog2, dog3) values (#{pid}, #{pw}, #{pname}, #{tel}, #{birth}, sysdate(), #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{email}, #{grade}, #{dog1}, #{dog2}, #{dog3})

insert into dogs (dname, weight, dogsize, gender, breed, dyear, dmonth, photo, notes, pid, grade) values (#{dname}, #{weight}, #{dogsize}, #{gender}, #{breed}, #{dyear}, #{dmonth}, #{photo}, #{notes}, #{pid}, '일반')
mapper.select: select * from member where pid = #{pid} and pw = #{pw}
mapper.update: update member set dog1 = #{dog1}, dog2 = #{dog2}, dog3 = #{dog3} where pid = #{pid}
mapper.delete: delete from member where pid = #{pid} and pw = #{pw}
